entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is mentioned as someone Harry has a friendship with. The text does not provide further information about Bathilda.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who is willing to fall in with Harry's dearest wish and is mentioned as having a plan again which has lifted her mood. She suggests practicing Disapparating together under the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: godric’s hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a location that Harry and Hermione are planning to go to. It is mentioned as a place where they will need to think carefully about their plan.

relationships.description: Hermione and Harry are planning to go to Godric's Hollow. The text mentions that they will need to think carefully about their plan when going there.
Hermione is mentioned as someone who has a friendship with Bathilda. The text does not provide further information about this relationship.
